pageContext.title: In brief: Shariah-compliant crypto exchange to launch in 2019
pageContext.content:
The first Islamic crypto exchange (FICE) by Adab Solutions is slated to open in 2019. The exchange will be operating according to shariah law principles. Islamic financial experts under its Shariah Advisory Board will analyze and confirm if each cryptocurrency listed on FICE is “halal.”

ADAB Solutions is expecting to achieve US$146 million in daily trading and US$4.4 billion monthly turnover by 2020.

Source: Cointelegraph

seo.title: In brief: Islamic crypto exchange to launch in 2019
seo.description: The exchange will only accept “halal” cryptocurrencies.
